content.zekr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنْ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ 'الله لا إلـه إلا هو الحي القيوم لا تأخذه سنة ولا نوم له ما في السماوات وما في الأرض من ذا الذي يشفع عنده إلا بإذنه يعلم ما بين أيديهم وما خلفهم ولا يحيطون بشيء من علمه إلا بما شاء وسع كرسيه السماوات والأرض ولا يؤوده حفظهما وهو العلي العظيم' -آية الكرسي,البقرة ,255.
content.zekr_transliteration: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajim. 'Allahu la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyum, la ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm, lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ardh, man dhal-ladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi-idhnihi, ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wa ma khalfahum, wa la yuhituna bi shay'in min 'ilmihi illa bima sha'a, wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samawati wal-ardh, wa la ya'uduhu hifdhuhuma, wa Huwal-'Aliyyul-'Adheem.' - Ayat al-Kursi, Al-Baqarah, 255.
content.english_translation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan. 'Allah! There is no god but He - the Living, The Self-subsisting, Eternal. No slumber can seize Him Nor sleep. His are all things In the heavens and on earth. Who is there can intercede In His presence except As he permitteth? He knoweth What (appeareth to His creatures As) Before or After Or Behind them. Nor shall they compass Aught of his knowledge Except as He willeth. His throne doth extend Over the heavens And on earth, and He feeleth No fatigue in guarding And preserving them, For He is the Most High, The Supreme (in glory).' - Verse of the Throne, Al-Baqarah, 255.
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح أجير من الجن حتى يمسى ومن قالها حين يمسى أجير من الجن حتى يصبح.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it when he enters the morning will be protected from the jinn until the evening, and whoever says it when he enters the evening will be protected from the jinn until the morning.

content.zekr: بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمنِ الرَّحِيم قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ، ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ، لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ، وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Rahim. Qul Huwallahu Ahad. Allahus-Samad. Lam yalid wa lam yulad. Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad.
content.english_translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful. Say, 'He is Allah, [who is] One. Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born, Nor is there to Him any equivalent.'
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح وحين يمسى كفته من كل شىء (الإخلاص والمعوذتين).
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it in the morning and evening, it will suffice him against everything (Al-Ikhlas and Al-Mu'awwidhatayn).

content.zekr: بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمنِ الرَّحِيم قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ، مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ، وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ، وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ، وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Rahim. Qul a'udhu birabbil-falaq. Min sharri ma khalaq. Wa min sharri ghasiqin idha waqab. Wa min sharrin-naffathati fil-'uqad. Wa min sharri hasidin idha hasad.
content.english_translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful. Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak, From the evil of that which He created, And from the evil of darkness when it settles, And from the evil of the blowers in knots, And from the evil of an envier when he envies.'
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح وحين يمسى كفته من كل شىء (الإخلاص والمعوذتين).
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it in the morning and evening, it will suffice him against everything (Al-Ikhlas and Al-Mu'awwidhatayn).

content.zekr: بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمنِ الرَّحِيم قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ، مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ، إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ، مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ، ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ، مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Rahim. Qul a'udhu birabbin-nas. Malikin-nas. Ilahin-nas. Min sharril-waswasil-khannas. Alladhi yuwaswisu fi sudurin-nas. Minal-jinnati wan-nas.
content.english_translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful. Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, The Sovereign of mankind, The God of mankind, From the evil of the retreating whisperer, Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind, From among the jinn and mankind.'
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح وحين يمسى كفته من كل شىء (الإخلاص والمعوذتين).
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it in the morning and evening, it will suffice him against everything (Al-Ikhlas and Al-Mu'awwidhatayn).

content.zekr: أَصْـبَحْنا وَأَصْـبَحَ المُـلْكُ لله وَالحَمدُ لله ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لهُ المُـلكُ ولهُ الحَمْـد، وهُوَ على كلّ شَيءٍ قدير ، رَبِّ أسْـأَلُـكَ خَـيرَ ما في هـذا اليوم وَخَـيرَ ما بَعْـدَه ، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما في هـذا اليوم وَشَرِّ ما بَعْـدَه، رَبِّ أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَـلِ وَسـوءِ الْكِـبَر ، رَبِّ أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَـذابٍ في النّـارِ وَعَـذابٍ في القَـبْر.
content.zekr_transliteration: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah, la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa Huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadir. Rabbi as'aluka khayra ma fi hadhal-yawmi wa khayra ma ba'dah, wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fi hadhal-yawmi wa sharri ma ba'dah. Rabbi a'udhu bika minal-kasali wa su'il-kibar. Rabbi a'udhu bika min 'adhabin fin-nari wa 'adhabin fil-qabr.
content.english_translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil of what follows it. My Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and senility. My Lord, I take refuge in You from torment in the Hellfire and torment in the grave.

content.zekr: اللّهـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْتَ ، خَلَقْتَنـي وَأَنا عَبْـدُك ، وَأَنا عَلـى عَهْـدِكَ وَوَعْـدِكَ ما اسْتَـطَعْـت ، أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما صَنَـعْت ، أَبـوءُ لَـكَ بِنِعْـمَتِـكَ عَلَـيَّ وَأَبـوءُ بِذَنْـبي فَاغْفـِرْ لي فَإِنَّـهُ لا يَغْـفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ .
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma Anta Rabbi la ilaha illa Ant, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduk, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata't. A'udhu bika min sharri ma sana't, abu'u laka bini'matika 'alayya, wa abu'u bidhanbi faghfir li fa'innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa Ant.
content.english_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship but You. You created me and I am your slave. I am upon Your covenant and Your promise as much as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sins except You.
content.bless: من قالها موقنا بها حين يمسى ومات من ليلته دخل الجنة وكذلك حين يصبح.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says this with conviction in the evening and dies during that night will enter Paradise, and likewise if he says it in the morning.

content.zekr: رَضيـتُ بِاللهِ رَبَّـاً وَبِالإسْلامِ ديـناً وَبِمُحَـمَّدٍ صلى الله عليه وسلم نَبِيّـاً.
content.zekr_transliteration: Radheetu billahi Rabba, wa bil-Islami deena, wa bi Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallama Nabiyya.
content.english_translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) as my Prophet.
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح وحين يمسى كان حقا على الله أن يرضيه يوم القيامة.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it in the morning and evening, it will be a right upon Allah to please him on the Day of Resurrection.

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَصْبَـحْتُ أُشْـهِدُك ، وَأُشْـهِدُ حَمَلَـةَ عَـرْشِـك ، وَمَلَائِكَتَكَ ، وَجَمـيعَ خَلْـقِك ، أَنَّـكَ أَنْـتَ اللهُ لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْـتَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك ، وَأَنَّ ُ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُكَ وَرَسـولُـك.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inni asbahtu ush-hiduk, wa ush-hidu hamalata 'arshik, wa mala'ikatak, wa jami'a khalqik, annaka Antallahu la ilaha illa Anta wahdaka la sharika lak, wa anna Muhammadan 'abduka wa Rasuluka.
content.english_translation: O Allah, I have reached the morning and call You to witness, and call to witness the bearers of Your Throne, Your angels, and all of Your creation, that You are Allah, there is no god but You, alone, without any partner, and that Muhammad is Your slave and Your Messenger.
content.bless: من قالها أعتقه الله من النار.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says this, Allah will free him from the Fire.

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ ما أَصْبَـَحَ بي مِـنْ نِعْـمَةٍ أَو بِأَحَـدٍ مِـنْ خَلْـقِك ، فَمِـنْكَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شريكَ لَـك ، فَلَـكَ الْحَمْـدُ وَلَـكَ الشُّكْـر.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma ma asbaha bi min ni'matin aw bi ahadin min khalqik, faminka wahdaka la sharika lak, falakal-hamdu wa lakash-shukr.
content.english_translation: O Allah, whatever blessing has come to me or to any of Your creation this morning is from You alone, You have no partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح أدى شكر يومه.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says this in the morning has fulfilled the thankfulness of his day.

content.zekr: حَسْبِـيَ اللّهُ لا إلهَ إلاّ هُوَ عَلَـيهِ تَوَكَّـلتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ العَرْشِ العَظـيم.
content.zekr_transliteration: HasbiyAllahu la ilaha illa Huwa, 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa Huwa Rabbul-'Arshil-'Adheem.
content.english_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. There is none worthy of worship but Him. I have placed my trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the Majestic Throne.
content.bless: من قالها كفاه الله ما أهمه من أمر الدنيا والأخرة.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says this, Allah will suffice him against all that concerns him of the affairs of this world and the Hereafter.

content.zekr: بِسـمِ اللهِ الذي لا يَضُـرُّ مَعَ اسمِـهِ شَيءٌ في الأرْضِ وَلا في السّمـاءِ وَهـوَ السّمـيعُ العَلـيم.
content.zekr_transliteration: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'as-mihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa Huwas-Sami'ul-'Aleem.
content.english_translation: In the Name of Allah, with Whose Name nothing can cause harm in the earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
content.bless_english_translation: Nothing will harm him from Allah.

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ بِكَ أَصْـبَحْنا وَبِكَ أَمْسَـينا ، وَبِكَ نَحْـيا وَبِكَ نَمُـوتُ وَإِلَـيْكَ النُّـشُور.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna, wa bika amsayna, wa bika nahya, wa bika namutu wa ilaykan-nushur.
content.english_translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

content.zekr: أَصْبَـحْـنا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ الإسْلاَمِ، وَعَلَى كَلِمَةِ الإِخْلاَصِ، وَعَلَى دِينِ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ، وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ أَبِينَا إبْرَاهِيمَ حَنِيفاً مُسْلِماً وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ المُشْرِكِينَ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Asbahna 'ala fitratil-Islam, wa 'ala kalimatil-ikhlas, wa 'ala deeni Nabiyyina Muhammadin sallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam, wa 'ala millati abina Ibraheema hanifan Musliman wa ma kana minal-mushrikeen.
content.english_translation: We have entered the morning upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim, who was upright and Muslim and not among those who associate others with Allah.

content.zekr: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْـقِه ، وَرِضـا نَفْسِـه ، وَزِنَـةَ عَـرْشِـه ، وَمِـدادَ كَلِمـاتِـه.
content.zekr_transliteration: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi 'adada khalqihi, wa ridha nafsihi, wa zinata 'arshihi, wa midada kalimatihi
content.english_translation: Glory be to Allah and praise Him to the number of His creation, His pleasure, the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَدَنـي ، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في سَمْـعي ، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَصَـري ، لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْـتَ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma 'afini fi badani, Allahumma 'afini fi sam'i, Allahumma 'afini fi basari, la ilaha illa Anta
content.english_translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body. O Allah, protect my hearing. O Allah, protect my sight. There is no deity except You

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُـفر ، وَالفَـقْر ، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر ، لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْـتَ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-kufri wal-faqri, wa a'udhu bika min 'adhabil-qabri, la ilaha illa Anta
content.english_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave. There is no deity except You

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أسْـأَلُـكَ العَـفْوَ وَالعـافِـيةَ في الدُّنْـيا وَالآخِـرَة ، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أسْـأَلُـكَ العَـفْوَ وَالعـافِـيةَ في ديني وَدُنْـيايَ وَأهْـلي وَمالـي ، اللّهُـمَّ اسْتُـرْ عـوْراتي وَآمِـنْ رَوْعاتـي ، اللّهُـمَّ احْفَظْـني مِن بَـينِ يَدَيَّ وَمِن خَلْفـي وَعَن يَمـيني وَعَن شِمـالي ، وَمِن فَوْقـي ، وَأَعـوذُ بِعَظَمَـتِكَ أَن أُغْـتالَ مِن تَحْتـي.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyah fid-dunya wal-akhirah. Allahumma inni as'alukal-'afwa wal-'afiyah fi deeni wa dunyaya wa ahli wa mali. Allahummastur 'awrati wa amin raw'ati. Allahummahfadhni min bayni yadayya wa min khalfi, wa 'an yameeni wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi'adhamatika an ughtala min tahti.
content.english_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religion, my worldly affairs, my family and my wealth. O Allah, conceal my faults and relieve my fears. O Allah, protect me from before me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me, and I seek refuge in Your greatness from being struck down from beneath me.

content.zekr: يَا حَيُّ يَا قيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أسْتَغِيثُ أصْلِحْ لِي شَأنِي كُلَّهُ وَلاَ تَكِلْنِي إلَى نَفْسِي طَـرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Ya Hayyu ya Qayyum, birahmatika astagheeth, aslih li sha'ni kullahu, wa la takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn.
content.english_translation: O Ever-Living, O Self-Subsisting and All-Sustaining, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.

content.zekr: أَصْبَـحْـنا وَأَصْبَـحْ المُـلكُ للهِ رَبِّ العـالَمـين ، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أسْـأَلُـكَ خَـيْرَ هـذا الـيَوْم ، فَـتْحَهُ ، وَنَصْـرَهُ ، وَنـورَهُ وَبَـرَكَتَـهُ ، وَهُـداهُ ، وَأَعـوذُ بِـكَ مِـنْ شَـرِّ ما فـيهِ وَشَـرِّ ما بَعْـدَه.
content.zekr_transliteration: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku Lillahi Rabbil-'alamin. Allahumma inni as'aluka khayra hadhal-yawm: Fathahu wa nasrahu wa nurahu wa barakatahu wa hudah. Wa a'udhu bika min sharri ma fihi wa sharri ma ba'dah.
content.english_translation: We have entered the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day: its victory, its help, its light, its blessings, and its guidance. And I seek refuge in You from the evil of what is in it and from the evil of what comes after it.

content.zekr: اللّهُـمَّ عالِـمَ الغَـيْبِ وَالشّـهادَةِ فاطِـرَ السّماواتِ وَالأرْضِ رَبَّ كـلِّ شَـيءٍ وَمَليـكَه ، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْت ، أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِن شَـرِّ نَفْسـي وَمِن شَـرِّ الشَّيْـطانِ وَشِرْكِهِ ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَـرِفَ عَلـى نَفْسـي سوءاً أَوْ أَجُـرَّهُ إِلـى مُسْـلِم.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma 'Alimal-ghaybi wash-shahadah, Fatiras-samawati wal-ard, Rabba kulli shay'in wa Malikah. Ash-hadu an la ilaha illa Ant. A'udhu bika min sharri nafsi, wa min sharrish-shaytani wa shirkih, wa an aqtarifa 'ala nafsi su'an aw ajurrahu ila Muslim.
content.english_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my own self, from the evil of Satan and his polytheism, and from causing evil to myself or bringing it upon a Muslim.

content.zekr: أَعـوذُ بِكَلِمـاتِ اللّهِ التّـامّـاتِ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما خَلَـق.
content.zekr_transliteration: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
content.english_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

content.zekr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ،إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammadin, kama sallayta 'ala ali Ibrahima, innaka Hamidun Majid. Allahumma barik 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammadin, kama barakta 'ala ali Ibrahima, innaka Hamidun Majid.
content.english_translation: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on the family of Ibrahim. Indeed, You are Praiseworthy, Majestic. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed the family of Ibrahim. Indeed, You are Praiseworthy, Majestic.
content.bless: من صلى على حين يصبح وحين يمسى ادركته شفاعتى يوم القيامة.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever sends blessings upon me morning and evening will attain my intercession on the Day of Resurrection.

content.zekr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِكَ شَيْئًا نَعْلَمُهُ ، وَنَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لَا نَعْلَمُهُ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inna na'udhu bika min an nushrika bika shay'an na'lamuh, wa nastaghfiruka lima la na'lamuh.
content.english_translation: O Allah, we seek refuge in You from associating anything with You knowingly, and we seek Your forgiveness for what we do not know.

content.zekr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ، وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wa a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wa a'udhu bika minal-jubni wal-bukhl, wa a'udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayni wa qahrir-rijal.
content.english_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being heavily in debt and from being overpowered by men.

content.zekr: أسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ العَظِيمَ الَّذِي لاَ إلَهَ إلاَّ هُوَ، الحَيُّ القَيُّومُ، وَأتُوبُ إلَيهِ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Astaghfirullahal-'Adheemal-ladhi la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyum, wa atubu ilayh.
content.english_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Self-Subsisting, and I repent to Him.

content.zekr: يَا رَبِّ , لَكَ الْحَمْدُ كَمَا يَنْبَغِي لِجَلَالِ وَجْهِكَ , وَلِعَظِيمِ سُلْطَانِكَ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Ya Rabbi, lakal-hamdu kama yanbaghi li-jalali wajhika, wa li-'adheemi sultanik.
content.english_translation: O Lord, praise be to You as befits the majesty of Your face and the greatness of Your might.

content.zekr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan.
content.english_translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, wholesome provision, and accepted deeds.

content.zekr: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لا إِلَهَ إِلا أَنْتَ ، عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ ، وَأَنْتَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ , مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ كَانَ ، وَمَا لَمْ يَشَأْ لَمْ يَكُنْ ، وَلا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلا بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ , أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ ، وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عِلْمًا , اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ دَابَّةٍ أَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهَا ، إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَى صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Allahumma anta Rabbi la ilaha illa ant, 'alayka tawakkalt, wa anta Rabbul-'Arshil-'Adheem, ma sha'Allahu kana, wa ma lam yasha' lam yakun, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billahil-'Aliyyil-'Adheem, a'lamu anna Allah 'ala kulli shay'in Qadeer, wa anna Allah qad ahata bikulli shay'in 'ilma, Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri nafsi, wa min sharri kulli dabbatin anta akhidhun binasiyatiha, inna Rabbi 'ala siratin mustaqeem.
content.english_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. I place my trust in You, for You are the Lord of the Mighty Throne. What Allah wills happens, and what He does not will does not happen. There is no power nor strength except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great. I know that Allah has power over all things and that Allah encompasses all things in knowledge. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of every creature that You hold by its forelock. Surely, my Lord is on a straight path.

content.zekr: لَا إلَه إلّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءِ قَدِيرِ.
content.zekr_transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in Qadeer.
content.english_translation: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner or associate. His is the dominion, and His is the praise, and He is able to do all things.
content.bless: كانت له عدل عشر رقاب، وكتبت له مئة حسنة، ومحيت عنه مئة سيئة، وكانت له حرزا من الشيطان.
content.bless_english_translation: For him is the reward of freeing ten slaves, a hundred good deeds are written for him, a hundred sins are erased, and it will be a protection for him from Satan.

content.zekr: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ.
content.zekr_transliteration: Subhanallahi wa bihamdihi.
content.english_translation: Glory be to Allah and praise Him.
content.bless: حُطَّتْ خَطَايَاهُ وَإِنْ كَانَتْ مِثْلَ زَبَدِ الْبَحْرِ. لَمْ يَأْتِ أَحَدٌ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ بِأَفْضَلَ مِمَّا جَاءَ بِهِ إِلَّا أَحَدٌ قَالَ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ أَوْ زَادَ عَلَيْهِ.
content.bless_english_translation: His sins will be removed, even if they were like the foam of the sea. No one will come on the Day of Resurrection with anything better than what he came with, except someone who said the same or more.

content.zekr: أسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ وَأتُوبُ إلَيْهِ
content.zekr_transliteration: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh.
content.english_translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.
content.bless: مائة حسنة، ومُحيت عنه مائة سيئة، وكانت له حرزاً من الشيطان حتى يمسى.
content.bless_english_translation: A hundred good deeds are recorded for him, a hundred sins are erased, and it will be a protection for him from Satan until evening.
